steps.SUT: The health IT developer demonstrates the Health IT Module supports application registration with an authorization server for the purposes of Electronic Health Information (EHI) access for single patients, including support for application registration functions to enable authentication and authorization in ยง 170.315(g)(10)(v).

The health IT developer demonstrates the Health IT Module supports application registration with an authorization server for the purposes of EHI access for multiple patients including support for application registration functions to enable authentication and authorization in ยง 170.315(g)(10)(v).
